title: Surgery using ultrasound energy found to treat high blood pressure

title_detail.value: Surgery using ultrasound energy found to treat high blood pressure

summary: A one-off operation that targets the nerves connected to the kidney has been found to maintain reduced blood pressure in hypertension patients for at least six months, according to the results of a clinical trial.

summary_detail.value: A one-off operation that targets the nerves connected to the kidney has been found to maintain reduced blood pressure in hypertension patients for at least six months, according to the results of a clinical trial.
